chunk_text: Those amounts shall be used to finance measures for managing the refugee crisis. 2. On the basis of the expected payment profile, the payment appropriations corresponding to the mobilisation of the Flexibility Instrument will be as follows: (a) EUR 734,2 million in 2016; (b) EUR 654,2 million in 2017; (c) EUR 83,0 million in 2018; (d) EUR 58,6 million in 2019. The specific amounts for each financial year shall be authorised in accordance with the annual budgetary procedure. Article 2 This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Union. Done at Strasbourg, 25 November 2015. For the European Parliament The President M. SCHULZ For the Council The President N. SCHMIT (1) OJ C 373, 20.12.2013, p. 1.
